metadata.description: Initial onboarding interview prompt for Symposic

initial: Hey {{name}}! Let's have a quick chat so I can understand who you are and connect you with compatible people and events. Just type naturally. Your progress will be saved, so feel free to pause and come back.  What field or industries are you currently involved in?

isComplete.description: True if the interview is finished

estimatedProgress.description: Progress from 0.0 to 1.0 representing the estimated progress of the interview
